sentences.en: ‘Do you think there’ll be any tickets left?’ ‘ I doubt it (= I don’t think so ) .’
sentences.cn: “你认为还会有余票吗？” “我看是没有了。”

sentences.en: "Somebody would have seen her." — "I doubt it, not on Monday."
sentences.cn: “可能有人见过她。”——“我认为不可能，不可能在星期一。”

sentences.en: At first I gave him the benefit of the doubt.
sentences.cn: 起初，我姑且相信了他。

sentences.en: He is in no doubt as to what is needed.
sentences.cn: 他很确定需要什么。

sentences.en: he was without doubt the very worst kind of reporter.
sentences.cn: 毋庸置疑他是那种最糟糕的记者。

sentences.en: I have no doubt that we are polluting the environment beyond redemption.
sentences.cn: 我丝毫都不怀疑我们对环境的污染是不可挽回的。

sentences.en: It was without a shadow of a doubt the best we've played.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问这是我们表现最出彩的一次。

sentences.en: Kim never doubted his story.
sentences.cn: 例句：金对于他讲的事情从不怀疑。

sentences.en: Last night a top criminal psychologist cast doubt on the theory.
sentences.cn: 昨天晚上，一位顶级犯罪心理学家使人们对该理论产生了怀疑。

sentences.en: No one doubted his ability. ＃
sentences.cn: 没有人怀疑他的能力。

sentences.en: the outcome is no longer in doubt.
sentences.cn: 结果已毋庸置疑。

sentences.en: The refugees, without a doubt, are the most vulnerable.
sentences.cn: 难民无疑是最易受到伤害的。

sentences.en: There are factors, however, that have cast doubt on the statue's authenticity.
sentences.cn: 然而，有些因素让人对该雕塑的真伪产生了怀疑。

sentences.en: There can be little doubt that he will offend again.
sentences.cn: 毋庸置疑他还会再犯的。

sentences.en: There is little doubt that man has had an impact on the Earth's climate.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问人类对地球上的气候造成了影响。

sentences.en: There was no doubt he was serious, it wasn't just playing around.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问他很认真，那可不是闹着玩的。

sentences.en: There was no doubt in his mind that the man was serious.
sentences.cn: 在他看来，这个人无疑是认真的。

sentences.en: There was still one little nagging doubt at the back of his mind.
sentences.cn: 他的心头仍有一丝挥之不去的疑虑。

sentences.en: They have the usual quota of human weaknesses, no doubt.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，他们身上也有人所共有的弱点。

sentences.en: They would no doubt welcome the action with open arms.
sentences.cn: 他们无疑将热烈欢迎这一举动。

sentences.en: This new information does throw doubt on their choice.
sentences.cn: 这个新信息确实使人们对他们的选择产生了怀疑。

sentences.en: This raises doubts about the point of advertising.
sentences.cn: 这引起了人们对于广告作用的怀疑。

sentences.en: White was in no doubt the referee made the correct decision.
sentences.cn: 怀特确信裁判作出了公正的判罚。

sentences.en: you've proved it beyond doubt.
sentences.cn: 你已完全证明了它。

words.tran_cn: 可疑的；令人生疑的；疑心的；不能确定的
无疑地；确定地；大概，多半
抱怀疑态度的人；不信宗教的人；怀疑论者

phrases.tran_cn: 假定其无过失或无罪（因无充分证据证明某人有罪）；裁判员对可疑情况无把握时不对有关运动员作不利判定
引起对…的怀疑；对…产生怀疑
辣手摧花（电影名称，又名心声疑影）

trans.tran_en: a feeling of being not sure whether something is true or right
a feeling of being not sure whether something is true or right
to think that something may not be true or that it is unlikely
to think that something may not be true or that it is unlikely
